title: Ticket #4043: RFE: Monitor /proc/io via condor_procd
description:
Something that operates similar to ImageSize today, but that records ClassAds maybe something like: 

JobBytesRead
JobBytesWritten
JobReadSysCalls
JobWriteSysCalls
DeviceBytesRead
DeviceBytesWritten
DeviceBytesCancelled

...and ideally also...

JobReadOpsPerSecond
JobWriteOpsPerSecond

Where you could develop throttling policies at a DAGMan management level around concurrency limiting or potentially evicting jobs based on stats like number-of-jobs * writes-per-second.
remarks: Dupe of #3850
